Description: Typical range for pulsed fiber lasers in semiconductor cleaning; starting at 50 W balances efficiency and safety for GaN's sensitivity to heat (thermal conductivity ~130 W/mK); max avoids melting point (~2500°C). Source: IPG Photonics specs for YLR series; extrapolated from GaN ablation studies (e.g., J. Appl. Phys. 2015).
Ultra-short pulses for minimal thermal damage
